Apparently it's pretty easy to/get into.  Basically the way that you get into or get other people into it is that you start out with telling them that you're trying to improve their pleasure and that they just need to listen to you and do something nice for them every time they obey and slowly go into it until they're willingly letting themselves be brainwashed.

Side note: no I don't promote the non-sexual and abusive form of brainwashing; only the sexual kinky kind.

Also I would suggest at least trying it cause it's fun.

topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521f3ae6368720e86830b00#post_5521f3ae6368720e86830b00
Hypnosis is suggestion; brainwashing is reprogramming.

In order for hypnosis to work you have to believe the person can change your mind; in order for brainwashing to work you have to believe that the person is working for your best interest.

Yes I am still talking about the sexual forms.

If you have a boyfriend/girlfriend this is a good way of changing something about your personality you don't like so long as it's consensual.  Also if you're one of those people that hates what sort of person you are yes you can go so far as to have your entire personality changed to who you want to become.

Side note: please only do this consensually.
